alert.note: Alert for Addison (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 10:08AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and/or snowmelt and/or ice jam is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Vermont, including the following county, Addison. * WHEN...Until 115 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1005 AM EST, Vermont State Police reported flooding along Route 125 between Ripton and Middlebury. Route 125 is presently closed due to high water. - Water levels should gradually recede by early afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Middlebury, Salisbury, Ripton and East Middlebury. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
